name: Twix.io Slap & Smash Cells
description:
Enter the arena and twist your ball to defeat others. Can you grow the biggest ball on the map?

Hit your opponents, collect their remaining cells and grow your mace to become the strongest!

You start the game with a small smasher ball and expand it by hitting other players and collecting little squares. In twix io game, all players have equal chance to win! Even you have a tiny smasher ball, you can bash others to get on the leaderboard. The bigger players you smash, the higher chance you take your spot in the leaderboard.

Watch out: other players will swing their mace to bash you as well. Defend yourself to survive and hit as many players as possible to become the top player in the game.

FEATURES:

• No lag. Works on many devices without performance issues.
• Internet connection is not needed.
• Smooth control on mobile devices.

WE VALUE YOUR FEEDBACK

From the creators of Landix.io; Twixio, a new io game by Clown Games, is still in development. We will listen you and develop our game according to your feedback and your wishes! Your reviews are important for us! Please send us any feedback.

If you like to play io games, this game is a perfect fit for you.
You can like twix.io on Facebook or follow us on Twitter to be updated about the game.
https://www.facebook.com/twixio
https://www.twitter.com/twixiogame
publishers: ALICTUS YAZILIM EGITIM BILISIM TEKNOLOJILERI ELEKTRONIK SANAYI VE TICARET
